tool_description: Estimates travel times between locations considering traffic patterns, distance, and time of day to support route optimization.
error_messages: Invalid address format: Provide valid street addresses or GPS coordinates
Invalid departure time: Use ISO 8601 format for date-time
Invalid transport mode: Must be one of [driving, walking, transit]
Route not found: No viable route exists between the specified locations
usage: Provide origin and destination addresses with departure time to get estimated travel duration and distance for route planning.
